name: Daniel Basilio
relationship: I worked with Francesco on the same team.
testimonial: Francesco is extremely intelligent, problem solving, with excellent interpersonal skills. A very reliable professional and strong leader.

name: Jamie Meakes
testimonial:
Francesco was an exceptional General Manager, when we worked together. 
 He led a new opening for me, and delivered well beyond what we asked for. Francesco was a pleasure to work with. 
 He has a passion for people and is a natural leader, yet humble enough to take advice and acts quickly when things need to get done. 
 A great manager and more importantly and great guy.
